name: Client Meeting Expense Tracker
description: Ideal for those who are looking to track their client meeting expenses in one glance.Are you looking for a tracker to manage your client meeting expenses?This tracker is perfect to add client meeting expenses, set budgeting and assess your overall cost expenses performance all under one glance.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?AutoDocCreator lets you instantly generate PDFs from Google Docs
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Install the extension and setup the automation.; One-time setup and configuration; Quick 5-minute installation process; Copy Notion Database properties placeholders; Paste them into your Google Document template; One-time setup per document template; Set your preferred automation schedule; Automatically scans Notion database
